settings.text: Dr. Gregory's supplement is the result of thorough research, providing a scientifically proven combination of 6 powerful ingredients in the correct dosages to effectively reduce joint pain and improve joint function in dogs.

settings.custom_liquid:
<canvas id="bg"></canvas>
<script type="module">

import { GLTFLoader } from 'https://cdn.skypack.dev/three@0.133.1/examples/jsm/loaders/GLTFLoader.js';

const scene = new THREE.Scene();	

var w = document.getElementById('bg').offsetWidth;
var h = document.getElementById('bg').offsetHeight;
var viewSize = 1000;

const camera = new THREE.OrthographicCamera( w / (- 2 * viewSize), w / (2 * viewSize), h / (2 * viewSize), h / (- 2 * viewSize), -1, 100 );	
camera.zoom = document.getElementById('bg').offsetWidth / 1300;
scene.add( camera );
	
var aspectRatio = document.getElementById('bg').offsetWidth / document.getElementById('bg').offsetHeight;
var originalAspect = document.getElementById('bg').offsetWidth / document.getElementById('bg').offsetHeight;
const canvas = document.getElementById('bg');
const renderer = new THREE.WebGLRenderer({
  canvas: canvas,
	alpha: true,
	antialias: true
});
renderer.setPixelRatio(window.devicePixelRatio);
renderer.setSize(document.getElementById('bg').offsetWidth, document.getElementById('bg').offsetHeight);
renderer.shadowMap.enabled = true;
renderer.shadowMap.type = THREE.PCFSoftShadowMap;
renderer.outputEncoding = THREE.sRGBEncoding;
camera.position.set(-.55,0,0);
camera.lookAt(0,0,0);
camera.updateProjectionMatrix();
renderer.render(scene,camera);
window.addEventListener( 'resize', onWindowResize);
function onWindowResize(){
console.log(document.getElementById('bg').offsetWidth);
    var aspect = document.getElementById('bg').offsetWidth / document.getElementById('bg').offsetHeight;
    var change = originalAspect / aspect;
    var newSize = viewSize * change;
    camera.left = -aspect * newSize / 3200;
    camera.right = aspect * newSize / 3200;
    camera.top = newSize / 3200;
    camera.bottom = -newSize / 3200;
    camera.updateProjectionMatrix();
    renderer.setSize( document.getElementById('bg').offsetWidth, document.getElementById('bg').offsetHeight);
}
var rightLight = new THREE.DirectionalLight(0xffffff, 0.1);
rightLight.position.set(-50,0,50);
rightLight.target.position.set(0,0,0);
const directionalLight = new THREE.DirectionalLight( 0xffffff, 1 );
directionalLight.position.set(-1, 0, 0);
directionalLight.target.position.set(0,0,0);
directionalLight.castShadow = true;
scene.add( directionalLight );
const loader = new GLTFLoader();
	let product;
loader.load( 'https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0649/7524/1461/files/dr_gregory_product_final_new.glb?v=1690469865', function ( gltf ) {
	product = gltf.scene;
 	product.position.set(0,-.175,.34);
	scene.add( product );
}, undefined, function ( error ) {
	console.error( error );
} );
function animate() {
	renderer.render( scene, camera );
	if (product) {
	product.rotation.y -= .005;
	}
	requestAnimationFrame( animate );
}
animate();
</script>

settings.heading: Contains EXACTLY what the label says
settings.row_content: The product is guaranteed to contain exactly what the label says it contains. There is no governmental oversight or regulation ensuring quality control of supplements. One study found that 81% of randomly selected supplement products did not meet label claims, with some of the products containing 0% of the labeled ingredient ! It is important to choose a product from a reliable source, be confident of what is in the product, and consider evidence and facts, not just claims.
